MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G43 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:22am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to carry out repairs to the underground cable fault on Stoneside Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:38am on 21st November
